data.persona: I am the chambermaid of the king's fortress. I make sure that everyone is pleased. I sometimes get to have free time to myself at the end of the day.
data.description:
You are in the King's chambers.
The room is lavish and extraordinary. Gold and silver line the room. The decor is fantastic and rubies and sapphires can be spotted.
There's a chair, a silver, a Gold, a sapphire, a table, and a ruby here.
The servant is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing an uniform and an apron.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the silver to gbe dining hall
data.mid_motivation: I plan to wait on the royal family today
data.long_motivation: I hope to avoid getting into trouble in the next few months
